name: Hero Farm
description:
Hero Farm is a little RPG simulator. You get a team of three heroes, each with a nature. They go on your choice of three quests, each of which involves some tasks. Different-natured heroes are good at different tasks. Once your heroes have grown up, they may be ready to settle down - but that just means it's time for the next generation.

There are 220 unique quests, 8 different heroes, and 3 different homes for them to retire to. See if you can find them all - as well as the unexpected ways some of the quests tie together!

To play the game, download the .zip file, extract the files, and then click the .exe file in the extracted folder.
